鉱害: (こうがい) - pollution or environmental damage due to mining
鉱山労働者: (こうざんろうどうしゃ) - miner
鉱山学: (こうざんがく) - mining studies; mining engineering; mining science
鉱工業: (こうこうぎょう) - mining and manufacturing industry
鉱工業生産指数: (こうこうぎょうせいさんしすう) - industrial production index; IPI
鉱床: (こうしょう) - mineral deposit; ore deposit
鉱床学: (こうしょうがく) - study of mineral deposits; economic geology
鉱泉: (こうせん) - mineral spring; spring containing many minerals and gas (esp. a cold spring)
鉱産物: (こうさんぶつ) - mineral product; minerals
鉱石検波器: (こうせきけんぱき) - crystal detector
鉱石車: (こうせきぐるま) - mine car; mine wagon
鉱脈: (こうみゃく) - vein (of ore); reef; streak; lode
鉱質コルチコイド: (こうしつコルチコイド) - mineral corticoid; mineralocorticoid
鉱車: (こうしゃ) - mine car; mine wagon
鉾先: (ほこさき) - point of spear/spearhead; brunt/aim of attack/force of argument
銀: (gin) - prata, prata (Ag); moeda de prata, dinheiro; medalha de prata; cor prata
銀ねず: (ぎんねず) - silver gray; silver grey
銀ぶら: (ぎんぶら) - stroll on the Ginza (i.e. the street)
銀を取る: (ぎんをとる) - {shogi} to capture a silver general; to desilverize/to desilverise
銀シャリ: (ぎんシャリ) - (term used during the food shortages after WWII) cooked white rice
銀ブラ: (ぎんブラ) - stroll on the Ginza (i.e. the street)
銀モール: (ぎんモール) - silver lace; silver braid
銀亀鯵: (ギンガメアジ) - bigeye trevally (Caranx sexfasciatus); bigeye jack; great trevally; six-banded trevally; dusky jack
銀交換: (ぎんこうかん) - {shogi} exchange of silver generals
銀側の時計: (ぎんがわのとけい) - silver watch
銀塊: (ぎんかい) - silver nugget; silver ingot; silver bullion
銀塩: (ぎんえん) - silver halide; silver salt
銀山猿子: (ギンザンマシコ) - pine grosbeak (Pinicola enucleator)
銀座: (ginza) - Ginza (bairro comercial em Tóquio); (Edo period) silver mint
銀文字: (ぎんもじ) - silver-gilt letters; silvery letters
銀木犀: (ギンモクセイ) - tea olive (Osmanthus fragrans); fragrant olive; sweet olive
銀本位制: (ぎんほんいせい) - silver standard system
銀杏: (イチョウ) - ginkgo (Ginkgo biloba); gingko; maidenhair tree
銀杏歯鯨: (イチョウハクジラ) - ginkgo-toothed beaked whale (Mesoplodon ginkgodens)
銀杏蟹: (イチョウガニ) - Cancer japonicus (species of crab)
銀杏返: (いちょうがえし) - ancient Japanese ladies' hairstyle
銀杏返し: (いちょうがえし) - ancient Japanese ladies' hairstyle
銀板写真: (ぎんばんしゃしん) - daguerreotype; daguerrotype
銀河目鯵: (ギンガメアジ) - bigeye trevally (Caranx sexfasciatus); bigeye jack; great trevally; six-banded trevally; dusky jack
銀流し: (ぎんながし) - silvering/silvered item; person who is all style and no substance/poser
銀灰色: (ぎんかいしょく) - silver gray; silver grey
銀盤: (ぎんばん) - skating rink/ice surface; silver plate
銀目: (ぎんめ) - (銀目 only) Edo-period unit of silver coinage; steel-blue eyes (e.g. of a cat); silver eye (species of beardfish, Polymixia japonica)
銀目鯛: (ギンメダイ) - silver eye (species of beardfish, Polymixia japonica)
銀眼: (ぎんめ) - (銀目 only) Edo-period unit of silver coinage; steel-blue eyes (e.g. of a cat); silver eye (species of beardfish, Polymixia japonica)
